abstract.p: Arts, Briefly column; WB network will broadcast preview of movie Batman Begins in conjunction with season finale of Smallville; photo (S)

block.p: Fans of superheroes will have double reason to cheer on May 18. In addition to the 90-minute season finale of ''Smallville,'' the WB network will broadcast an eight-minute preview of ''Batman Begins,'' opening in theaters on June 17. The film, starring Christian Bale, left, explores the origin of the Dark Knight and his quest to become a force for justice in Gotham City. The ''Smallville'' finale presents the graduation of Clark Kent (played by Tom Welling) from high school.
